sentences.en: ...a spontaneous outburst of cheers and applause.
sentences.cn: …由衷爆发出的欢呼声和掌声。

sentences.en: [ Enthusiastic outburst of sarcastic applause ] That seems to be all.
sentences.cn: ( 热烈的讥讽喝彩声轰然响起 ) 好像就是这么多了.

sentences.en: Alice's carelessness provoked her teacher to an outburst.
sentences.cn: 艾丽斯的粗心大意使老师大为发火.

sentences.en: Five people were reported killed today in a fresh outburst of violence.
sentences.cn: 据报道在今天最新发生的暴乱中有5人丧生。

sentences.en: He is deeply compunctious for his outburst.
sentences.cn: 他为自己的大发雷霆深感懊悔.

sentences.en: He later apologized for his outburst.
sentences.cn: 他后来为自己发脾气而道歉。

sentences.en: He was prompted to a rare outburst of feeling.
sentences.cn: 他被惹得情绪非常激动，这很少见。

sentences.en: Her angry outburst was totally unprovoked.
sentences.cn: 她的暴跳如雷完全是无理取闹。

sentences.en: His rash outburst incurred the displeasure of the judge.
sentences.cn: 他勃然大怒使法官不悦.

sentences.en: Marcus remained placid in the face of her outburst.
sentences.cn: 马库斯面对她的发作保持平静。

sentences.en: The outburst was inconsistent with the image he has cultivated.
sentences.cn: 这样大发脾气与他所树立的个人形象不相称。

sentences.en: There was an outburst of laughter in the hall.
sentences.cn: 大厅里迸发出一阵笑声.

sentences.en: There was an outburst of squeals from the cage.
sentences.cn: 铁笼子里传来一阵吱吱的叫声.

sentences.en: They could not let such an outburst go unpunished.
sentences.cn: 他们不会让你这么狂叫一声而不惩罚你的.

sentences.en: We couldn't make any sense of his sudden outburst.
sentences.cn: 我们被他这没头没脑的话给弄愣了.

sentences.en: What had I done to deserve this outburst of confidence?
sentences.cn: 我干了什么事,赢得了突如其来的信任?

trans.tran_en: a sudden short increase in an activity
